name: ACOPoolFactory
description: ACOPoolFactory. The contract is the implementation for the ACOProxy.

functionDecorators.name: createAcoPool
functionDecorators.description: Function to create a new ACO pool. It deploys a minimal proxy for the ACO pool implementation address.

parameterDecorators.name: underlying
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the underlying asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: strikeAsset
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the strike asset (0x0 for Ethereum).

parameterDecorators.name: isCall
parameterDecorators.description: True if the type is CALL, false for PUT.

parameterDecorators.name: poolStart
parameterDecorators.description: The UNIX time that the ACO pool can start negotiated ACO tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: minStrikePrice
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum strike price for ACO tokens with the strike asset precision.

parameterDecorators.name: maxStrikePrice
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum strike price for ACO tokens with the strike asset precision.

parameterDecorators.name: minExpiration
parameterDecorators.description: The minimum expiration time for ACO tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: maxExpiration
parameterDecorators.description: The maximum expiration time for ACO tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: canBuy
parameterDecorators.description: Whether the pool buys ACO tokens otherwise, it only sells.

parameterDecorators.name: strategy
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the pool strategy to be used.

parameterDecorators.name: baseVolatility
parameterDecorators.description: The base volatility for the pool starts. It is a percentage value (100000 is 100%).

functionDecorators.name: init
functionDecorators.description: Function to initialize the contract. It should be called through the `data` argument when creating the proxy. It must be called only once. The first `require` is to guarantee that behavior.

parameterDecorators.name: _factoryAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoPoolImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO pool implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoFactory
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO token factory.

parameterDecorators.name: _acoFlashExercise
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO flash exercise.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoFactory
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO factory address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoFactory
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the ACO token factory.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoFlashExercise
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO flash exercise address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoFlashExercise
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new ACO flash exercise.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolBaseVolatility
functionDecorators.description: Function to change the ACO pools base volatilities. Only can be called by a pool admin.

parameterDecorators.name: baseVolatilities
parameterDecorators.description: Array of the base volatilities to be set.

parameterDecorators.name: acoPools
parameterDecorators.description: Array of ACO pools addresses.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolFee
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO Pool fee. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoPoolFee
parameterDecorators.description: Value of the new ACO Pool fee. It is a percentage value (100000 is 100%).

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolFeeDestination
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO Pool destination address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoPoolFeeDestination
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new ACO Pool destination.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO pool implementation address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAcoPoolImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new ACO pool implementation.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolPermission
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO pool permission. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: poolAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the pool admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newPermission
parameterDecorators.description: The permission to be set.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolStrategy
functionDecorators.description: Function to change the ACO pools strategy. Only can be called by a pool admin.

parameterDecorators.name: strategy
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the strategy to be set.

parameterDecorators.name: acoPools
parameterDecorators.description: Array of ACO pools addresses.

functionDecorators.name: setAcoPoolStrategyPermission
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the ACO pool strategies permitted. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: strategy
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the strategy.

parameterDecorators.name: newPermission
parameterDecorators.description: The permission to be set.

functionDecorators.name: setChiToken
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the Chi Token address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newChiToken
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new Chi Token.

functionDecorators.name: setFactoryAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Function to set the factory admin address. Only can be called by the factory admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newFactoryAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new factory admin.
